text: Lucier is a French surname that derives from the name Lussier. Notable people with the name include: *Alvin Lucier (born 1931), American composer *Étienne Lucier (1793–1853), fur trader in what is now the Pacific Northwest *James P. Lucier, an author, and former staff member of the United States Senate *Mary Lucier (born 1944), American artist *Lou Lucier (1918–2014), Major League Baseball pitcher *Paul Lucier (1930–1999), Canadian politician *Wayne Lucier (born 1979), former American football center and guard for the New York Giants from 2003 to 2005 == References ==
title: Lucier
